languages.text: "Когда по кораблю блуждали слухи о появлении Теодоры фон Валанциус... Я видела множество всполохов желтого. Ваши люди надеялись, что это правда".
"When rumours of Theodora von Valancius's appearance were spreading all over the ship... I saw many flashes of yellow — your crew hoped it was true."
languages.original_text: "Когда по кораблю блуждали слухи о появлении Теодоры фон Валанциус... Я видела множество всполохов желтого. Ваши люди надеялись, что это правда".

traits.locale_text: "When rumours of Theodora von Valancius's appearance were spreading all over the ship... I saw many flashes of yellow — your crew hoped it was true."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When rumours of Theodora von Valancius's appearance were spreading all over the ship... I saw many flashes of yellow — your crew hoped it was true."

traits.locale_text: "When rumours of Theodora von Valancius's appearance were spreading all over the ship... I saw many flashes of yellow — your crew hoped it was true."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “当西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯再次现身的谣言传遍全船时……我看到许多黄色的闪光——你的船员都希望这是真的。”
languages.original_text: "When rumours of Theodora von Valancius's appearance were spreading all over the ship... I saw many flashes of yellow — your crew hoped it was true."

traits.locale_text: “当西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯再次现身的谣言传遍全船时……我看到许多黄色的闪光——你的船员都希望这是真的。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Quand la rumeur selon laquelle Théodora von Valancius aurait été aperçue sur le vaisseau s'est répandue... j'ai vu beaucoup d'éclats jaunes. Votre équipage espérait vraiment que c'était vrai. »
languages.original_text: "When rumours of Theodora von Valancius's appearance were spreading all over the ship... I saw many flashes of yellow — your crew hoped it was true."

traits.locale_text: « Quand la rumeur selon laquelle Théodora von Valancius aurait été aperçue sur le vaisseau s'est répandue... j'ai vu beaucoup d'éclats jaunes. Votre équipage espérait vraiment que c'était vrai. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Cuando los rumores de la aparición de Theodora von Valancius se propagaban por la nave... vi muchos destellos de amarillo. La tripulación tenía esperanza de que fuera cierto».
languages.original_text: "When rumours of Theodora von Valancius's appearance were spreading all over the ship... I saw many flashes of yellow — your crew hoped it was true."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando los rumores de la aparición de Theodora von Valancius se propagaban por la nave... vi muchos destellos de amarillo. La tripulación tenía esperanza de que fuera cierto».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様が現れたという噂が船中に広まったとき…私は数多の黄色い光の明滅を見ました――乗組員たちは、それが真実であることを願っていたのです」
languages.original_text: "When rumours of Theodora von Valancius's appearance were spreading all over the ship... I saw many flashes of yellow — your crew hoped it was true."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスが現れたという噂が船中に広まったとき…私は数多の黄色い光の明滅を見ました――乗組員たちは、それが真実であることを願っていたのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Als sich auf dem Schiff das Gerücht verbreitet hat, dass Theodora von Valancius gesehen wurde ... Da habe ich viele gelbe Blitze gesehen. Eure Crew hat gehofft, dass es wahr ist."
languages.original_text: "When rumours of Theodora von Valancius's appearance were spreading all over the ship... I saw many flashes of yellow — your crew hoped it was true."

traits.locale_text: "Als sich auf dem Schiff das Gerücht verbreitet hat, dass Theodora von Valancius gesehen wurde ... Da habe ich viele gelbe Blitze gesehen. Eure Crew hat gehofft, dass es wahr ist."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "When rumours of Theodora von Valancius's appearance were spreading all over the ship... I saw many flashes of yellow — your crew hoped it was true."

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius'un belirdiği söylentisi tüm gemiye yayılınca... Çok fazla sarı ışıltı gördüm. Mürettebat, söylentinin doğru olmasını ummuş yani."
languages.original_text: "When rumours of Theodora von Valancius's appearance were spreading all over the ship... I saw many flashes of yellow — your crew hoped it was true."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius'un belirdiği söylentisi tüm gemiye yayılınca... Çok fazla sarı ışıltı gördüm. Mürettebat, söylentinin doğru olmasını ummuş yani."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
